tags.name: kemet-rotator
tags.description: A component that rotates through an array of text.

properties.name: activeSlide
properties.description: The index number for the current slide.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the rotator block.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the rotator block.

properties.name: messages
properties.description: Text in the rotator. Supports HTML.

properties.name: rotationSpeed
properties.description: How fast, in seconds, each slide lasts. Stop the rotator with 0.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-rotator-transition-speed
cssProperties.description: How long, in css time units, the transition effect lasts.
